about_the_game:
Average Human Ball Game is a two-player game that combines the fast-paced action of a fighter with elements of a sports game. Whether you're playing locally with a friend or competing online, the objective is simple yet challenging: hit the ball into your opponent's net to score points.

Use a variety of moves and techniques to outmaneuver your opponent and gain control of the ball. Perfect your timing and defend your goal with skillful precision. With its action packed blend of combat and sports, Average Human Ball Game offers a fresh and exciting gaming experience for players of all skill levels. Are you ready to prove your dominance on the field?

The game features a retro 80's vaporwave vibe, immersing players in a neon-soaked, synth-driven atmosphere that adds a unique and nostalgic flair to the experience.
